articles.title: Iran's propaganda implies Soleimani is being widely mourned — and U.S. media are buying it
articles.description: Iran's attack on the U.S. following Qassem Soleimani's assassination is portrayed as a response on behalf of a mourning population. But that's propaganda.

articles.title: The Iran attacks are the result of Trump's foreign policy of being better than Obama
articles.description: Iran's missile attacks in response to Trump's targeting killing of Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani is a result of Trump throwing out the Iran nuclear deal.
articles.content: A desire to evade President Barack Obama's long shadow seems to be at the center of any number of momentous foreign policy decisions President Donald Trump has made. In abandoning the Trans-Pacific Partnership, the Paris climate agreement and the rapprochemen… [+5880 chars]

articles.title: Examining slavery's legacy with Nikole Hannah-Jones and Ibram X. Kendi: podcast and transcript
articles.description: Live in Chicago, Chris Hayes speaks with Nikole Hannah-Jones and Ibram X. Kendi about the 400-year legacy of slavery in America.
articles.content: In our third stop of the fall tour, Nikole Hannah-Jones, the architect behind "The 1619 Project," and Ibram X. Kendi, author of How To Be an Antiracist, joined Chris Hayes to examine the 400 year legacy of slavery in America. Together they examined the sinist… [+71986 chars]
